Goop
Whats great about him is you dont need LOF. He can sit in safety with stealth/cr and just wait for a near hit and turn it into a miss. There is nothing opponent can do about it. Then his stats/powers are also great with high values w/ blades/flurry. Solid figure. Too bad he's prime and can't be played with Leopard from F4. That would have been a sick combo.
